Articles.Content: Do mods work with the new version or should I wait till they are updated?

Each mod needs to be treated independently: some may need updating, and some will be fine.

You can check the release threads of the individual mods in the forum for comments regarding 0.21.x compatibility, or you can try them out one-by-one. If you do the latter then I recommend that you start with a clean install then add in just one mod, test it, see if it works and remove it if it is broken; then try the next.

If it's a widely-used enough mod, the thread for it will probably have people complaining if it's broken and hasn't been updated. Or with workaround info if it mostly works but needs some minor adjustment first.
